name: intimidate

effect.x-y: Does not take effect if acquired after entering battle.
effect.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire: Does not take effect if acquired after entering battle.

short_effect: Lowers opponents' Attack one stage upon entering battle.

flavor_text.x-y: Lowers the opposing Pokémon’s Attack stat.
flavor_text.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire: Lowers the opposing Pokémon’s Attack stat.
